title: ‘One of My Best Performances Ever’: Tom Pidcock Pressures Tadej Pogačar in Huge Strade Bianche Display
content:
Briton Pidcock left with mixed emotions after taking second in race: ‘When Pogačar crashed, he looked quite bad’.

Read the full article at ‘One of My Best Performances Ever’: Tom Pidcock Pressures Tadej Pogačar in Huge Strade Bianche Display on Velo.
author: sstokes
